author: gmsx
title: Town Center Set with Roadways
review:
This was given to me by my parents as a gift for my Holy Communion, in May 1974, when I was 9 years old... 

It was certainly NOT my first Lego set, but it was - and still is my memory - of the Lego gifts I always treasured the most... 

Not many pieces, but it was one of the best set sold back then!
